review: The fire tv stick is well worth the price I paid for it on sale.~ 97% of the time it runs smooth, the other ~3% of the time it drops/loses my wifi. I am aware of wifi channel traffic and signal strength (I use Wifi Analyzer app), and I will concede that my wireless router is in the opposite corner of my house. Beside the occasional wifi issue acting up, it works great, and I love it.The apps I use all seem to work smoothly, and the layout/menus are intuitively easy to navigate. Credit to Amazon for keeping up on updates, and adding new apps regularly.
author: Shawn

review: This worked good for like two weeks.  After that Netflix would not play anything.  I contacted customer service and got a less than helpful response.  Now about a month later, my Hulu will not work or play anything either.  I have checked (multiple times) if my system was up to date and have unplugged it just as many times.  I am less than impressed with it and even less happy with the customer service I received.

review: I never wanted to pay for cable TV because it was too pricey and I do not watch a lot of television due to my heavy work schedule. Amazon Prime and the Fire TV Stick was exactly what I needed. Entertainment without a huge price. The movies tend to be "B" movies, but I enjoy all the TV series programs they make available with Amazon Prime. The Fire TV Stick was easy to install. Biggest problem I had was remembering what was my security code for my Wifi since I had not added anything new in years.
